comment: A version of ~ ax-wl-13v with one distinct variable restriction dropped. For convenience, ` y ` is kept on the right side of equations. This proof bases on ideas from NM, 24-Dec-2015. (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 23-Jul-2021.)
